name: Death Bolt
description:
Deals [9_dark:dark] damage to one target.
Slain living units are raised as skeletons.
Raised skeletons have max HP equal to that of the slain unit, and deal [5_physical:physical] damage in melee.
Skeletons of flying units can fly.

upgrades.label: soulbattery
upgrades.name: Soul Battery
upgrades.description: Deathbolt gains 3 damage whenever it slays a target, lasts until next realm.

upgrades.label: winter
upgrades.name: Winter Bolt
upgrades.description: Deathbolt also deals ice damage

upgrades.label: chaos
upgrades.name: Chaos Skeletons
upgrades.description: Raised skeletons are Chaos skeletons, gaining resistances, a chaos ball attack, and spawning a number of imps on death proportional to their max hp.

name: Fireball
description: Deals [9:damage] [fire] damage to units in a [2_tile:radius] burst.

upgrades.label: chaos
upgrades.name: Chaos Ball
upgrades.description: Fireball randomly deals [physical], [lightning], or [fire] damage.  If a unit is resistant to one or more of these damage types, fireball deals the damage type that unit is least resistant to.

upgrades.label: ash
upgrades.name: Ash Ball
upgrades.description: Fireball blinds and poisons units for 4 turns.

upgrades.label: meteor
upgrades.name: Meteor
upgrades.description: Units in the center tile take extra [physical] damage and are stunned for [3:duration] turns.

name: Icicle
description:
Deal [6_physical:physical] damage to the target.
Then, deal [6_ice:ice] to the target and a [1_tile:radius] area around it.
If cast on a chasm tile, creates a floor tile.

upgrades.label: freezing
upgrades.name: Freezing
upgrades.description: Freeze the main target for 2 turns

upgrades.label: ice_spear
upgrades.name: Ice Spear
upgrades.description: Deals physical damage to all units in a beam to the main target

name: Lifedrain
description: Deals [3_dark:dark] damage to target unit each turn for [15_turns:duration], healing the caster for the same amount.

upgrades.label: bond
upgrades.name: Blood Bond
upgrades.description: Blood tap also heals 2 random [living] allies.

upgrades.label: chain
upgrades.name: Life Funnel
upgrades.description: Blood tap also drains life from 2 random enemy units up to 3 tiles away from the target.

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Blood Tap can be cast without line of sight

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Deals [12_lightning:lightning] damage in a beam.

upgrades.label: channel
upgrades.name: Channeling
upgrades.description: Lightning bolt can be channeled for up to 10 turns.

upgrades.label: scrolls
upgrades.name: Electric Ink
upgrades.description: Whenever Lightning Bolt kills a unit, spawn a living lightning scroll that can recast your lightning spell once.

upgrades.label: energy
upgrades.name: Energy Bolt
upgrades.description: Lightning bolt also deals arcane damage

name: Magic Missile
description: Deal [11_arcane:arcane] damage to the target.

upgrades.label: shield_burn
upgrades.name: Shield Burn
upgrades.description: Magic Missile removes up to 3 SH from the target before dealing damage.

upgrades.label: disruption
upgrades.name: Disruption Bolt
upgrades.description: If Magic Missile targets an [arcane] unit, it deals [dark] and [holy] damage instead of [arcane].

upgrades.label: barrage
upgrades.name: Arcane Crossfire
upgrades.description: When you cast Magic Missile, up to [4:num_targets] additional missiles are fired from [arcane] allies in line of sight of the target.

upgrades.label: ricochet
upgrades.name: Ricochet
upgrades.description: Magic Missile bounces up to [2:num_targets] times to targets in range and line of sight of the target.

name: Poison Sting
description:
Deal [9_physical:physical] damage to target unit.
That unit is [poisoned] for [30_turns:duration].
[Poisoned] units take 1 [poison] damage each turn and cannot heal.

upgrades.label: antigen
upgrades.name: Acidity
upgrades.description: Damaged targets lose all poison resist

upgrades.label: webs
upgrades.name: Silk Shot
upgrades.description: Stuns target and spawns webs along a line to the target.  Webs stun enemy units that enter them for 2 turns.

upgrades.label: radius
upgrades.name: Stinger Barrage
upgrades.description: Shoots at every poisoned enemy in a radius of 3.

name: Wolf
description: Summon [1:num_summons] wolf with a leap attack.

upgrades.label: ice_hound
upgrades.name: Ice Hound
upgrades.description: Summon ice hounds instead of wolves.

upgrades.label: clay_hound
upgrades.name: Clay Hound
upgrades.description: Summon clay hounds instead of wolves.

name: Annihilate
description: Deals [16_fire:fire] damage, [16_lightning:lightning] damage, and [16_physical:physical] damage to the target.

upgrades.label: cascade_range
upgrades.name: Cascade
upgrades.description: Hits from Annihilate will jump to nearby targets if the main target is killed

upgrades.label: extra
upgrades.name: Comprehensive Annihilation
upgrades.description: Annihilate deals additional dark and arcane damage hits

upgrades.label: doom_storm
upgrades.name: Doom Storm
upgrades.description: Annihilate chains to up to [5:num_targets] random storms in line of sight

name: Boiling Blood
description:
All allied units gain stacking [6_damage:damage] bonus to their fire and physical abilities.
Lasts [7_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: holy_fury
upgrades.name: Holy Fury
upgrades.description: Boiling Blood also impacts holy abilities

upgrades.label: dark_fury
upgrades.name: Dark Fury
upgrades.description: Boiling Blood also impacts dark abilities

name: Bone Spear
description:
Deals [16_physical:physical] damage to all units in a line.
This spell can target and destroy a wall tile.

upgrades.label: fire
upgrades.name: Infernal Spear
upgrades.description: Bone Spear also deals [fire] damage.

upgrades.label: toxic
upgrades.name: Toxic Spear
upgrades.description: Whenever the spear kills a unit, up to 3 enemy units within a [3_tile:radius] radius take [16_poison:poison] damage.

upgrades.label: stun
upgrades.name: Stun Spear
upgrades.description: Bone Spear applies stun for 3 turns

name: Chaos Barrage
description:
Fire [9_bolts:num_targets] of chaotic energy at random units in a cone.
Each bolt randomly deals [6_fire:fire], [6_lightning:lightning], or [6_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: shockwaves
upgrades.name: Shockwaves
upgrades.description: Each bolt also deals damage to adjacent enemies

upgrades.label: smart_targeting
upgrades.name: Smart Bolts
upgrades.description: Chaos barrage ignores allies, and always uses the damage type the target resists the least

name: Devour Mind
description:
Deal [24_arcane:arcane] to an enemy unit.
Then, if the target is under 50%% HP, deal it an additional [24_dark:dark] damage.
Can only target [living] units.

upgrades.label: huskify
upgrades.name: Huskification
upgrades.description: Killed targets are raised as zombies

upgrades.label: spiriteater
upgrades.name: Spirit Eater
upgrades.description: Can target [demon] and [arcane] units

upgrades.label: gluttony
upgrades.name: Gluttony
upgrades.description: If Devour Mind kills the target, the charge cost is refunded

name: Disperse
description:
Teleport all units in a [4_tile:radius] radius to random locations
The caster is unaffected.

upgrades.label: warpdagger
upgrades.name: Violent Warp
upgrades.description: Casts Magic Missile on all teleported enemy units

upgrades.label: sheilds
upgrades.name: Protective Warp
upgrades.description: Teleported allied units in the radius gain 3 SH

name: Dreamwalk
description:
Dreamwalk for 5 turns.  Afterwards, you are returned to the location you cast it at, restored to the HP you cast it at.
Casting Dreamwalk while dreamwalk is already active will simply end the current walk.

name: Eye of Fire
description:
Every [3_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [15_fire:fire] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts [30_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: replace_cast
upgrades.name: Eye of Fireballs
upgrades.description: Eye of Fire casts your fireball spell

upgrades.label: summon_eyeball
upgrades.name: Fiery Onlooker
upgrades.description: Eye of fire summons a fiery eyeball on expiration

upgrades.label: cascade
upgrades.name: Eye of Conflaguration
upgrades.description: Whenever eye of fire kills an enemy, it fires again

name: Eye of Ice
description:
Every [3_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [15_ice:ice] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts [30_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: summon_eyeball
upgrades.name: Frosty Onlooker
upgrades.description: Summons a Frosty Eyeball when the buff runs out.

upgrades.label: freezing
upgrades.name: Eye of Freezing
upgrades.description: Freezes target for 3 turns.

upgrades.label: replace_cast
upgrades.name: Eye of Iceballs
upgrades.description: Eye of Ice casts your Iceball spell.

name: Eye of Lightning
description:
Every [3_turns:shot_cooldown], deals [15_lightning:lightning] damage to a random enemy unit in line of sight.
Lasts [30_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: healing
upgrades.name: Archon Eye
upgrades.description: Allies along the beam are healed for [15:damage] and gain [1_SH:shields]

upgrades.label: replace_cast
upgrades.name: Eye of Thunderstrike
upgrades.description: Eye of Lightning casts your Thunderstrike spell.

upgrades.label: applies_buff
upgrades.name: Penetrating Gaze
upgrades.description: Eye of Lightning applies a non-stacking -50 Lightning resist to target.

name: Eye of Rage
description:
Every [3_turns:shot_cooldown], inflict [berserk] on a random enemy unit in line of sight for [2_turns:berserk].
Lasts [20_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: lycanthrophy
upgrades.name: Lycanthropy
upgrades.description: When Eye of Rage targets a [living] unit with 25 or less HP, that unit is instantly killed and raised as friendly Werewolf.  That Werewolf is berserked for 14 turns.

upgrades.label: connected_group
upgrades.name: Infectious Rage
upgrades.description: Eye of Rage targets a connected group

upgrades.label: fiery_aura
upgrades.name: Burning Rage
upgrades.description: Targeted units gain a fiery aura that damages nearby units.

name: Fan of Flames
description:
Deal [9_fire:fire] damage to all units in a cone.
This spell can be channeled for up to [10_turns:duration].  The effect is repeated each turn the spell is channeled.

upgrades.label: heal
upgrades.name: Healing Hearthfire
upgrades.description: Fan of Flames heals allies instead of damaging them.

upgrades.label: frostfire
upgrades.name: Fan of Frostfire
upgrades.description: Fan of flames also deals Ice damage.

upgrades.label: wildfire
upgrades.name: Wildfire
upgrades.description: Fan of Flames gains 1 range for the next turn for each enemy unit killed.

name: Freeze
description:
Target unit is [frozen] for [5_turns:duration].
[Frozen] units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking [fire] or [physical] damage.

upgrades.label: refreezing
upgrades.name: Refreezing
upgrades.description: The target is refrozen every turn for the duration.

upgrades.label: freeze_group
upgrades.name: Mass Freeze
upgrades.description: Freeze a connected group.

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Quickcast
upgrades.description: Casting freeze does not end your turn

name: Goatia Offering
description: Summon a Goatia.

upgrades.label: reincarnation
upgrades.name: Reincarnation
upgrades.description: The Goatia reincarnates once upon death

upgrades.label: pain
upgrades.name: Pain Aura
upgrades.description: The Goatia deals [5:minion_damage] [dark] damage to any unit that damages it

upgrades.label: maggot_host
upgrades.name: Maggot Host
upgrades.description: On death, the Goatia spawns [2:num_summons] mind maggots

name: Healing Light
description: Heal all allies in line of sight for [25_health:heal].

upgrades.label: shields
upgrades.name: Shielding Light
upgrades.description: Allies in line of sight gain 1 shield

upgrades.label: remove_debuffs
upgrades.name: Purifying Light
upgrades.description: Allies in line of sight lose all debuffs

upgrades.label: heart_flame
upgrades.name: Heartflame
upgrades.description: Whenever Healing Light heals an ally, the nearest enemy in line of sight of that ally takes that much [fire] and [holy] damage.

name: Heavenly Blast
description: Deal [14_holy:holy] damage to enemies and heal allies for [14_hp:heal] along a beam and in a [1_tile:radius] burst.

upgrades.label: spiritbind
upgrades.name: Spirit Bind
upgrades.description: Slain enemies create temporary spirits.  Spirits are blinking holy undead with 4 hitpoints and a 2 damage ranged holy attack.

upgrades.label: shield
upgrades.name: Shield
upgrades.description: Affected ally units gain 2 SH, to a maximum of 5.

upgrades.label: echo_heal
upgrades.name: Echo Heal
upgrades.description: Affected ally units are re-healed for half the initial amount each turn for 5 turns.

name: Hungry Maw
description:
Summons a hungry maw.
The maw is shielded, floats, and is stationary.
The maw has a ranged [physical] attack, which pulls enemies towards it.
The maw vanishes after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: devour
upgrades.name: Gnashing Teeth
upgrades.description: Hungry Maw gains a [physical] melee attack which attacks four times

upgrades.label: void
upgrades.name: Void Maw
upgrades.description: Hungry Maw gains a wall melting arcane beam attack

name: Iceball
description:
Deals [14_ice:ice] damage in a [2_tile:radius] burst.
Affected units in the area are [frozen] for [3_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: cloud_combustion
upgrades.name: Cloud Combustion
upgrades.description: Gains +2 radius and x2 damage if cast on a Blizzard tile. The Blizzard tile is consumed.

upgrades.label: icecrush
upgrades.name: Ice Crush
upgrades.description: Units inside of the area of effect which are already frozen take physical damage before being refrozen.

upgrades.label: summon_faery
upgrades.name: Fae Ball
upgrades.description: Whenever you cast Iceball, summon 1 ice faery for every 4 enemies it freezes.

name: Immolate
description:
Target enemy takes [3_fire:fire] damage each turn for [8_turns:duration].
This damage increases by [3_damage:damage] each turn.

upgrades.label: mass_immolate
upgrades.name: Conflaguration
upgrades.description: Immolate also affects a connected group of enemies.

upgrades.label: radiant_heat
upgrades.name: Radiant Heat
upgrades.description: Immolate deals half damage to units in a [3_tile:radius] radius around the target each turn.

upgrades.label: dragon_soul
upgrades.name: Dragon Soul
upgrades.description: When an immolated enemy dies, regain a charge of a random level 4 or lower [dragon] spell you know.

name: Invoke Savagery
description:
Each living ally attacks a random enemy unit in melee range.
The attack deals [14_physical:physical] damage and inflicts [2_turns:duration] of [stun].

upgrades.label: poison
upgrades.name: Venomous Bite
upgrades.description: Poisons targets for 10 turns.

upgrades.label: leap_attack
upgrades.name: Savage Leap
upgrades.description: Instead of a melee attack, do a leap attack.

upgrades.label: recharge_wolf
upgrades.name: Scavengers
upgrades.description: Every 3 kills gain a wolf charge.

name: Magnetize
description:
Magnetize target metallic unit.
Enemy units within a [4_tile:radius] radius of the magnetized unit are pulled [1_tiles:range] towards the unit each turn.
Afterwards, adjecent enemy units are stunned for 1 turn. and take [3_lightning:lightning] damage.
Lasts [5_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: radioactivity
upgrades.name: Radioactivity
upgrades.description: Lowers target's [lightning:lightning] and [arcane:arcane] resist by 75.

upgrades.label: electromagnetism
upgrades.name: Electromagnetism
upgrades.description: Deals [lightning:lightning] damage to all units in range rather than just adjacent units.

upgrades.label: cast_mercurize
upgrades.name: Liquid Magnetism
upgrades.description: Casts your Mercurize with 1 duration on adjacent enemy units.

name: Melt
description: Target unit takes [22_fire:fire] damage and loses [100_physical:physical] resist.

upgrades.label: num_targets
upgrades.name: Mass Melt
upgrades.description: Chains to up to [2:num_targets] adjacent enemies.

upgrades.label: ice_resist
upgrades.name: Ice Penetration
upgrades.description: Melt also reduces [ice] resist by 100

name: Mercurize
description:
Afflict the target with Mercurize.  The target takes [2_poison:poison] and [2_physical:physical] damage each turn for [6_turns:duration].
If the target dies while cursed, it is raised as a Quicksilver Geist.
Geists are flying undead metallic units with many resistances and immunities.
The Geist has max HP equal to the cursed unit, and a trample attack dealing [10_physical:physical] damage.
Geist dissapear after [32_turns:minion_duration]

upgrades.label: dark
upgrades.name: Morbidity
upgrades.description: Mercurized targets also take dark damage

upgrades.label: corrosion
upgrades.name: Corrosion
upgrades.description: Mercurized targets lose 50 physical resist

upgrades.label: noxious_aura
upgrades.name: Toxic Fumes
upgrades.description: Quicksilver Geists have a noxious aura that deals 1 poison damage to enemy units within [2_tiles:radius] each turn.

upgrades.label: vengeance
upgrades.name: Mercurial Vengeance
upgrades.description: When a Quicksilver Geist is killed, its killer is affliected with Mercurize.

name: Moon Glaive
description: Deals [7_arcane:arcane] and [7_physical:physical] damage in a line to target empty tile.The glaive will linger on the target tile for 1 turn, and return at the end of your next turn, dealing damage again.

upgrades.label: los_damage
upgrades.name: Glimmerblade
upgrades.description: Deals [1_arcane:arcane] damage to all enemies in LOS.

upgrades.label: lightning_damage
upgrades.name: Electroblade
upgrades.description: Deals [7_lightning:lightning] damage to up to 3 enemies near the blade's destination.

upgrades.label: recharge
upgrades.name: Steelshaping
upgrades.description: Regain a charge of another random Metallic spell.

name: Petrify
description:
Inflict [petrify] on the target for [10_turns:duration].
[Petrified] units cannot act.
[Petrified] units gain [100_ice:ice] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [100_lightning:lightning] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [75_physical:physical] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [75_fire:fire] resist.

upgrades.label: glassify
upgrades.name: Glassify
upgrades.description: Turn the target to glass instead of stone.  Glass targets have -100 physical resist.

upgrades.label: arcane_conductivity
upgrades.name: Arcane Conductivity
upgrades.description: Target loses [100_arcane:arcane] resist.

upgrades.label: petrified_animation
upgrades.name: Rocky Servitude
upgrades.description: On death, raise target as a golem.

name: Plague of Undeath
description:
Curse a group of [living] units with the essence of undeath.
Affected units become [undead] and lose [living].
Affected units lose [25%:damage] of their max HP.
Affected units then take [6_poison:poison] damage.
Affected units lose [100_holy:holy] resist.
Affected units gain [100_dark:dark] resist.
Affected units cannot be healed.

upgrades.label: raise_zombie
upgrades.name: Plague of Undead
upgrades.description: Raise killed units as zombies.

name: Pyrostatic Pulse
description:
Deal [16_fire:fire] damage in a beam.
Deal [16_lightning:lightning] damage to tiles adjacent to the beam.

upgrades.label: chaos
upgrades.name: Chaos Pulse
upgrades.description: Add a physical damage layer.

upgrades.label: lesser_cascade
upgrades.name: Lesser Cascade
upgrades.description: [Lightning:lightning] damage arcs to [2:num_targets] enemy units in line of sight.

upgrades.label: greater_cascade
upgrades.name: Greater Cascade
upgrades.description: On kill, jump to a new target

name: Regeneration Aura
description: Each turn for [8_turns:duration], all allied units in a [10_tile:radius] radius are healed for [4_HP:heal].

upgrades.label: whole_map
upgrades.name: Global
upgrades.description: The aura heals all allies on the level

name: Scourge
description:
The target is stunned for [5_turns:duration].
Each turn, the target and all units within [1_tiles:radius] take [5_holy:holy] damage.

upgrades.label: refresh_conjuration
upgrades.name: Redemption
upgrades.description: When a Scourged enemy dies, gain a charge of a random Holy conjuration.

upgrades.label: refresh_dominate
upgrades.name: Conversion
upgrades.description: When a Scourged enemy dies, gain a charge of Dominate.

upgrades.label: mass_scourge
upgrades.name: Mass Scourge
upgrades.description: Scourge is applied to a connected group of enemies.

name: Soul Swap
description: Swap places with a friendly [undead] unit.

upgrades.label: forced_transfer
upgrades.name: Forced Transfer
upgrades.description: Soul Swap can target enemy undead units as well.

name: Thunder Strike
description:
Deal [24_lightning:lightning] damage to the target.
Stun all enemies in a [2_tile:radius] burst around the target.

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Thunderstrike can be cast without line of sight

upgrades.label: storm_power
upgrades.name: Storm Power
upgrades.description: Charge cost is refunded if the target tile already has a thunder storm.

upgrades.label: heaven_strike
upgrades.name: Heaven Strike
upgrades.description: Thunder Strike also deals holy damage

name: Touch of Death
description: Deal [200_dark:dark] damage to one unit in melee range.

upgrades.label: fire_damage
upgrades.name: Flametouch
upgrades.description: Touch of death also deals 200 [fire] damage.

upgrades.label: raise_vampire
upgrades.name: Touch of the Vampire
upgrades.description: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raised as a friendly Vampire.

upgrades.label: raise_reaper
upgrades.name: Touch of the Reaper
upgrades.description: When a [living] target dies to touch of death, it is raise as a friendly Reaper for [6:minion_duration] turns

upgrades.label: hand_of_death
upgrades.name: Hand of Death
upgrades.description: Touch of death hits up to [4:num_targets] more adjacent targets

name: Toxic Spores
description:
Summons [2:num_summons] Mushbooms.
Mushbooms have [11_HP:minion_health].
Mushbooms have a ranged attack dealing [1_poison:poison] damage and inflicting [4_turns:duration] of [poison].
Mushbooms inflict [12_turns:duration] of [poison] on units in melee range when they die.

upgrades.label: grey_mushboom
upgrades.name: Grey Mushbooms
upgrades.description: Summon grey mushbooms instead, which apply stun instead of poison.

upgrades.label: red_mushboom
upgrades.name: Red Mushbooms
upgrades.description: Summon red mushbooms instead, which do not apply poison but deal fire damage

upgrades.label: glass_mushboom
upgrades.name: Glass Mushbooms
upgrades.description: Summon glass mushbooms instead, which apply glassify instead of poison

name: Toxin Burst
description:
Deal [1_poison:poison] damage and inflict [poison] on all units in a [4_tile:radius] radius for [20_turns:duration].
[Poisoned] units take 1 [poison] damage each turn and cannot heal.

upgrades.label: chemical_remedy
upgrades.name: Herbal Remedy
upgrades.description: All allies in the radius are healed instead of damaged and poisoned.

upgrades.label: deal_dark
upgrades.name: Withertoxin
upgrades.description: Toxin Burst also deals [15_dark:dark] damage.

upgrades.label: summon_bomber
upgrades.name: Toxin Bomber
upgrades.description: Summons a Poison Bomber in the center of the burst that deals [15_poison:poison] damage.

name: Aether Swap
description:
Swap places with target unit.
That unit takes [16_arcane:arcane] damage.
Cannot target [arcane] immune units.

upgrades.label: petrify
upgrades.name: Petrification
upgrades.description: Casts your Petrify on the target.

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Aether Swap can be cast without line of sight

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Quickcast
upgrades.description: Casting Aether Swap does not end your turn

name: Arcane Orb
description:
Summon an arcane orb next to the caster.
The orb can cast magic missile, and gains any magic missile upgrades you posess..
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by arcane damage.

upgrades.label: cast_blazerip
upgrades.name: Blazerip Orb
upgrades.description: Arcane Orb casts your Blazerip spell instead of your Magic Missile spell.

upgrades.label: double_shot
upgrades.name: Double Shot
upgrades.description: Arcane Orb fires twice.

upgrades.label: orb_walk
upgrades.name: Orb Detonation
upgrades.description: Targeting an existing arcane orb detonates it, casting your Magic Missile [12:num_targets] times.

name: Basilisk Armor
description:
Whenever an enemy unit targets you with a spell or attack, that unit is [petrified] for [2:duration] turns.
Lasts [10_turns:duration].

name: Blazerip
description:
Deals [12_arcane:arcane] and [12_fire:fire] damage in a [7_tile:radius] line perpendicular to the caster.
Melts walls in the affected area.

upgrades.label: mirror
upgrades.name: Dual Blazerip
upgrades.description: Blazerip also casts behind the player.

upgrades.label: aether_poison
upgrades.name: Aether Poison
upgrades.description: Inflicts Aether Poison on units it hits. Aether Poison lasts [4:duration] turns, and deals [1_arcane:damage] damage per turn, and causes the enemy to lose 50 [arcane] resistance during the duration.

upgrades.label: blazebugs
upgrades.name: Blazebugs
upgrades.description: On kill, summon a swarm of either Fae Flies or Burning Flies.

name: Blinding Light
description:
[Blind] all units in line of sight of the caster for [4_turns:duration].
[Blind] units have all their spell ranges reduced to 1.Deals [5_holy:holy] damage to affected undead and demon units.

upgrades.label: inflict_stun
upgrades.name: Halting Light
upgrades.description: Deals [1_turn:duration] of stun to all enemy units.

upgrades.label: deal_fire
upgrades.name: Searing Light
upgrades.description: Deals [5_fire:fire] damage to all enemy units in LOS.

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Quickcast
upgrades.description: Casting Blinding Light does not end your turn

name: Blink
description: Teleport to target tile

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Blink can be cast without line of sight

upgrades.label: dispersal
upgrades.name: Dissolution
upgrades.description: Casting blink also casts dispersion

upgrades.label: thunder
upgrades.name: Thunderblink
upgrades.description: Casting blink casts thunderstrike on the two closest enemy targets.

name: Bloodshift
description:
Enemies in a [4_tile:radius] burst take [18_dark:dark] damage.
Whenever an enemy is dealt damage this way, you or a random wounded ally in the targeted area is healed for half that amount.

upgrades.label: toxicity
upgrades.name: Toxic Shift
upgrades.description: Bloodshift also deals [poison] damage, though this damage does not cause healing.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
Fire an arcing bolt of electricity dealing [12_lightning:lightning] damage.
The bolt repeatably arcs to new targets within the cascade range.
Each arc deals damage to all units along a beam.
The bolt can arc up to [5_tiles:radius], and cannot pass through walls.
The bolt terminates when it cannot arc to any new targets.

upgrades.label: chain_fireball
upgrades.name: Chain Fireball
upgrades.description: Cast Fireball for free on each target chain lightning bounces to

upgrades.label: weathercraft
upgrades.name: Cloud Conductance
upgrades.description: Chain Lightning can arc to blizzards and storm clouds

upgrades.label: shield
upgrades.name: Lightning Shield
upgrades.description:
Chain Lightning can arc to friendly targets.
Friendly units hit by Chain Lightning gain 1 SH, up to a max of 3, instead of damaged.

name: Choir of Angels
description:
Summons a choir of [4:num_summons] angelic singers.
The singers have [10_HP:minion_health], [1_SH:shields], 50% resistance to [fire] and [holy] damage, and 100% resistance to [dark] damage.
The angels can sing, dealing [2_fire:fire] and [2_holy:holy] damage to all [undead], [demon], and [dark] units in a [5_tile:radius] radius. [Living] and [holy] units in the song's radius are healed for [1_HP:heal].
The angels vanish after [10:minion_duration] turns.

upgrades.label: cast_deathbolt
upgrades.name: Dual Angels
upgrades.description: Angels can cast your Death Bolt on a 4 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: conversion
upgrades.name: Mercy
upgrades.description: When an enemy is healed for a cumulative total more than its max health, it becomes an ally.

name: Darkness
description:
Each turn, [blind] all units for [1_turn:duration].
[Blind] units have all their spell ranges reduced to 1.
Lasts [5_turns:duration]

upgrades.label: darkvision
upgrades.name: Darkvision
upgrades.description: Doesn't blind you or your allies

upgrades.label: deal_clouds
upgrades.name: Dark Clouds
upgrades.description: Deal [5_dark:dark] damage to all enemies under clouds each turn.

name: Death Chill
description:
Deal [11_dark:dark] damage to the target each turn for [5_turns:duration].
If the target dies during this time, deals [11_ice:ice] damage and inflicts [frozen] for [5_turns:duration] on all enemies within a [3_tiles:radius] radius.
[Frozen] units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking [fire] or [physical] damage.

upgrades.label: raise_skeleton
upgrades.name: Icy Necromancy
upgrades.description: Raise slain [living] units as Icy Skeletons.

upgrades.label: deal_poison
upgrades.name: Slaughter Chill
upgrades.description: Also deals poison damage to main target.

upgrades.label: mass_deathchill
upgrades.name: Mass Death Chill
upgrades.description: Applies Death Chill to a connected group of enemies.

name: Devour Flesh
description: Devour an allied [living] unit to heal yourself for its current hp.

upgrades.label: control
upgrades.name: Controlled Appetite
upgrades.description: Instead of killing the target, only steal as much HP as you are missing.

upgrades.label: heal_allies
upgrades.name: Mass Feeding
upgrades.description: Also heal allies in a 2 tile radius.

upgrades.label: charred_flesh
upgrades.name: Charred Flesh
upgrades.description: Slain Living units are raised as Burning Skeletons.

name: Dominate
description: Target enemy unit with no more than [40_max_HP:heal] becomes your minion.

upgrades.label: hp_threshold
upgrades.name: HP Threshold
upgrades.description: Increase the maximum HP units which can be targeted

upgrades.label: check_cur_hp
upgrades.name: Brute Force
upgrades.description: Dominate targets based on current hp instead of maximum hp.

upgrades.label: make_lich
upgrades.name: Undead Servitude
upgrades.description: Transforms the target into a lich.

name: Earthen Sentinel
description:
Summon an Earth Elemental.
Earth elementals have [120_HP:minion_health], [50_physical:physical] resist, [50_fire:fire] resist, [50_lightning:lightning] resist, and cannot move.
Earth elementals have a melee attack which deals [20_physical:physical].The elemental vanishes after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: earthquake_totem
upgrades.name: Earthquake Totem
upgrades.description: Earthen Sentinel gains your Earthquake spell on a 3 turn cool down.

upgrades.label: stinging_totem
upgrades.name: Stinging Totem
upgrades.description: Earthen Sentinel gains your Poison Sting spell.

upgrades.label: holy_totem
upgrades.name: Holy Totem
upgrades.description: Earthen Sentinel gains your Heavenly Blast spell on a 2 turn cool down.

name: Earthquake
description:
Invoke an earthquake with a [7_tile:radius] radius.
Each tile in the area has a 50% chance to be affected.
Units on affected tiles take [21_physical:physical] physical damage.
Walls on affected tiles are destroyed.

upgrades.label: safety
upgrades.name: Safety
upgrades.description: Earthquake will not damage friendly units.

upgrades.label: radius_buff
upgrades.name: Aftershocks
upgrades.description: Whenever you cast Earthquake, Earthquake gains +2 radius for 2 turns.

upgrades.label: stun
upgrades.name: Magnitude 8.0
upgrades.description: Stuns for 7 turns.

name: Flame Gate
description:
Whenever you cast a [fire] spell, summon a fire elemental at the target of that spell.
Fire elementals have [22_HP:minion_health], [100_fire:fire] resist, [50_physical:physical] resist, and [-50_ice:ice] resist.
Fire elementals have an attack which deals [7_fire:fire] damage with a [4_tile:minion_range] range.
Fire elementals vanish after [9_turns:minion_duration].
This effect lasts until you fail to cast a fire spell.

upgrades.label: radius
upgrades.name: Burst Fire
upgrades.description: Elemental attacks gain 1 radius.

upgrades.label: cast_eye
upgrades.name: Eye Gate
upgrades.description: Your elementals instantly cast your Eye of Fire spell when summoned

upgrades.label: starfire_summon
upgrades.name: Starfire Gate
upgrades.description: Starfire Gate can sustain off of both Fire and Arcane spells. Starfire Gate summons Starfire Elementals instead of Fire Elementals.

name: Frostfire Hydra
description:
Summon a frostfire hydra.
The hydra has [16_HP:minion_health], and is stationary.
The hydra has a beam attack which deals [7_fire:fire] damage with a [9_tile:minion_range] range.
The hydra has a beam attack which deals [7_ice:ice] damage with a [9_tile:minion_range] range.
The hydra vanishes after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: crystal_eyes
upgrades.name: Crystal Eyes Hydra
upgrades.description: 50% of damage dealt by Frostfire Hydra is redealt as Arcane damage.

upgrades.label: freezing
upgrades.name: Freezing Ice
upgrades.description: Frostfire Hydra's Ice beam freezes units for 2 turns.

name: Ghostball
description:
Deal [11_dark:dark] damage to enemy units in a [1_tile:radius] radius.
Summon ghosts at empty tiles in the radius.
Ghosts have [4_HP:minion_health], fly, [100_physical:physical] resist, [50_dark:dark] resist, and passively blink.
Ghosts have a melee attack which deals [1_dark:dark] damage.
The ghosts vanish after [14_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: king
upgrades.name: Ghost King
upgrades.description: A Ghost King is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.

upgrades.label: mass
upgrades.name: Ghost Mass
upgrades.description: A Ghostly Mass is summoned at the center of the ghost ball.

name: Giant Bear
description:
Summon a giant bear.
The bear has [75_HP:minion_health].
The bear has a melee attack which deals [10_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: armored
upgrades.name: Metal Bear
upgrades.description: Summons a metallic bear instead of a giant bear.

upgrades.label: venom
upgrades.name: Venom Bear
upgrades.description: Summons a venom bear instead of a giant bear.  Venom Bears have a poison bite, and heal whenever an enemy takes poison damage.

upgrades.label: blood
upgrades.name: Blood Bear
upgrades.description: Summons a blood bear instead of a giant bear.  Blood bears are resistant to dark damage, and deal increasing damage with each attack.

name: Glass Orb
description:
Summon a glass orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb inflicts [glassify] on enemy units in a [3_tile:radius] area.
[Glassified] units cannot act.
[Glassified] units gain [-100_physical:physical] resist.
[Glassified] units gain [100_ice:ice] resist.
[Glassified] units gain [100_lightning:lightning] resist.
[Glassified] units gain [75_fire:fire] resist.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by physical damage.

upgrades.label: petrification
upgrades.name: Petrification Orb
upgrades.description: Casts your petrify every turn.

upgrades.label: shards
upgrades.name: Orb Shards
upgrades.description: Each turn the orb shoots out two glass shards that deal [16_physical:physical] damage to random enemies in LOS

name: Holy Armor
description:
Gain [50_physical:physical] resist.
Gain [50_fire:fire] resist.
Gain [50_lightning:lightning] resist.
Gain [50_dark:dark] resist.
Lasts [9_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: crystal_armor
upgrades.name: Crystal Armor
upgrades.description: Also provides resistance to [arcane:arcane], [holy:holy], and [ice:ice].

upgrades.label: smiting_thorns
upgrades.name: Smiting Thorns
upgrades.description: Whenever you take damage, deal [7_lightning:lightning] damage to the source.

name: Holy Fire
description:
Deal [22_fire:fire] damage in a vertical line and [22_holy:holy] damage in a horizontal line.
[Stun] [demon] and [undead] units in the affected area.

upgrades.label: holy_smite
upgrades.name: Holy Smite
upgrades.description: Holy Fire deals additional lightning damage on the center tile.

upgrades.label: divine_blaze
upgrades.name: Divine Blaze
upgrades.description: Holy Fire casts your Blazerip spell.

upgrades.label: heaven_call
upgrades.name: Heaven Call
upgrades.description: If Holy Fire kills a unit, gain a charge of Call Seraph.

name: Ironize
description:
All allied units gain [50_physical:physical] resist, [50_fire:fire] resist, and [50_lightning:lightning] resist and become metallic.
Lasts [10_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: armor_plating
upgrades.name: Armor Plating
upgrades.description: Grants 1 SH to all minions.

upgrades.label: permanence
upgrades.name: Permanent Transmutation
upgrades.description: Permanent duration.

name: Lightning Halo
description:
Deal [15_lightning:lightning] damage to all units in a [3_tile:radius] ring each turn.
Lasts [9_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: ring_of_fire
upgrades.name: Ring of Fire
upgrades.description: Lightning Halo creates an additional ring with 1 greater radius that deals [fire:fire] damage.

upgrades.label: radioactivity
upgrades.name: Radioactive Field
upgrades.description: Deals 50% [poison:poison] damage to enemies inside the halo.

upgrades.label: expanding
upgrades.name: Lightning Nova
upgrades.description: Every turn, Lightning Halo gets +1 radius

name: Lightning Spire
description:
Summon a Lightning Spire.
Lightning Spires are stationary [metallic] constructs with [25:minion_health] max hp.
Each turn, the spire will zap up to [4:num_targets] enemy units up to [5:minion_range] tiles away, dealing [8_lightning:lightning] damage.

upgrades.label: blindcasting
upgrades.name: Wall Penetration
upgrades.description: The spires can zap enemies through walls.

upgrades.label: resistance_debuff
upgrades.name: Resistance Penetration
upgrades.description: Zapped units permenantly lose 10 [lightning] resistance.

name: Lumbriogenesis
description:
Sacrifice half your HP rounded up and summon a wormball with that much hp.
Wormballs regenerate 3 HP per turn and have a melee attack dealing damage equal to half their max HP.
If you sacrificed 50 or more hp, summon a worm shambler instead of a worm ball.

upgrades.label: toxic
upgrades.name: Toxogenesis
upgrades.description: Summons a toxic worm ball instead.  Toxic wormballs have a poison aura.

upgrades.label: iron
upgrades.name: Mechanogenesis
upgrades.description: Summons an iron worm ball instead.  Iron wormballs have many resistances.

upgrades.label: ghostly
upgrades.name: Ectogenesis
upgrades.description: Summons a ghost worm ball instead.  Ghost wormballs have many resistances, are undead, and teleport.

name: Mystic Power
description:
All other spells gain [7_damage:damage].
Lasts [8_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: bonus
upgrades.name: Damage Bonus
upgrades.description: Mystic Power's damage bonus is increased by 4

upgrades.label: stackable
upgrades.name: Intensity
upgrades.description: Mystic Power stacks in intensity instead of duration

name: Mystic Vision
description:
All other spells gain [5_range:range].
Lasts [8_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: aura
upgrades.name: Vision Aura
upgrades.description: Mystic vision affects all allied units

name: Nightmare Aura
description:
Each turn, randomly deals [2_arcane:arcane] or [2_dark:dark] damage to each enemy in a [6_tile:radius] radius.
This damage is fixed, and cannot be increased using shrines, skills, or buffs.
Lasts [20_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: dark_dream
upgrades.name: Dark Dream
upgrades.description: Upon ending, temporarily summon Ravens, Werewolves, and Old Witches based on the total damage dealt by the spell.

upgrades.label: electric_dream
upgrades.name: Electric Dream
upgrades.description: Upon ending, temporarily summon Spark Spirits, Thunderbirds, and Aelves based on the total damage dealt by the spell.

upgrades.label: fever_dream
upgrades.name: Fever Dream
upgrades.description: Upon ending, temporarily summon Fire Lizards, Fire Spirits, and Flame Rifts based on the total damage dealt by the spell.

name: Plague of Filth
description:
Summon a group of [2:num_summons] toads and fly swarms.
Toads have [12_HP:minion_health].
Toads have a ranged tongue attack which deals [2_physical:physical] damage and pulls enemies towards it.
Toads can hop up to [4_tiles:range] away.
Fly swarms have [6_HP:minion_health], [75_dark:dark] resist, [75_physical:physical] resist, [-50_ice:ice] resist, and can fly.
Fly swarms have a melee attack which deals [1_physical:physical] damage.
The summons vanish after [7_turns:minion_duration].
This spell can be channeled for up to [15_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: snakes
upgrades.name: Serpent Plague
upgrades.description: Plague of Filth has a 50% chance of summoning a snake instead of a fly swarm or frog.  Snakes have 3/4 the health of toads, deal 1 more damage.  Snakes apply 5 stacks of poison on hit.

name: Prison of Thorns
description:
Surround a group of enemies with carnivorous plants.
The plants have [7_HP:minion_health] and cannot move.
The plants have a melee attack which deals [3_physical:physical] damage.
The plants vanish after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: iron
upgrades.name: Iron Prison
upgrades.description: Summon iron thorns instead, which deal 3 more damage and are resistant to many forms of damage.

upgrades.label: icy
upgrades.name: Icy Prison
upgrades.description: Summon icy thorns instead, which have a ranged ice attack.

name: Psychic Seedling
description: Plant a brain bush seedling.  It will eventually mature into a forest of brain bushes.

upgrades.label: psychic_forest
upgrades.name: Psychic Fields
upgrades.description: Plant 5 seedlings instead of 1

upgrades.label: eternal_forest
upgrades.name: Immortal Forest
upgrades.description: Grow an Immortal Seedling instead of a normal one.

upgrades.label: parasite
upgrades.name: Parasitic Growth
upgrades.description: May target an enemy instead of an empty tile.  Targeted enemy takes [1_arcane:arcane] damage per turn for 10 turns.  If the enemy dies, if it had 40 or more max hp, spawn a brain tree where it died.

name: Seal Fate
description: After [4_turns:duration], deal [160_dark:dark] damage to target unit.

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Seal Fate can be cast without line of sight

upgrades.label: spreads
upgrades.name: Spreading Curse
upgrades.description: When Sealed Fate's duration expires, it jumps to a random enemy in line of sight.

upgrades.label: genocide
upgrades.name: Genocide
upgrades.description: Seal Fate effects all enemies with the same name as target.

name: Shrapnel Blast
description:
Detonate target wall tile.
Enemies adjacent to the wall tile take [12_fire:fire] damage.
The explosion fires [16_shards:num_targets] at random tiles in a [4_tile:radius] burst.
Each shard deals [12_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: num_targets
upgrades.name: More Shrapnel
upgrades.description: 12 more shrapnel shards are shot

upgrades.label: puncture
upgrades.name: Puncturing Blast
upgrades.description: The shrapnel can penetrate or destroy walls

upgrades.label: homing
upgrades.name: Magnetized Shards
upgrades.description: The shrapnel shards always target enemies if possible.

name: Sight of Blood
description:
Must target a damaged [living] unit.
The target is [stunned] for [4_turns:duration].
[Stunned] units cannot act.
All [living] enemies in line of sight of the target go [berserk] for [4_turns:duration].
[Berserk] units are hostile to all other units, they will attack and be attacked by their allies.

upgrades.label: demon_units
upgrades.name: Demon Frenzy
upgrades.description: Demon units are also affected

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Sight of Blood can be cast without line of sight

name: Silver Spear
description:
Deals [27_physical:physical] damage to the target.
Deals [27_holy:holy] damage to [dark] and [arcane] units within a [1_tile:radius] away from the projectiles path.

upgrades.label: deal_lightning
upgrades.name: Copper Shaft
upgrades.description: Deals Lightning damage to all enemies adjacent to the spear.

upgrades.label: cast_holyblast
upgrades.name: Consecration
upgrades.description: Cast your Heavenly Blast on slain targets.

name: Suspend Mortality
description: Target allied unit gains the ability to reincarnate on death.

upgrades.label: lives
upgrades.name: Endlessness
upgrades.description: The target gains 3 reincarnations instead of just 1.

upgrades.label: mass
upgrades.name: Mass Immortaity
upgrades.description: All allies with the same name as the target are also affected.

upgrades.label: essence
upgrades.name: Twilight Essence
upgrades.description: Targeted unit gains the [holy] and [undead] tags and 25 [holy] and [dark] resist.

name: Underworld Passage
description:
Teleport to any tile adjacent to a chasm.
Can only be cast while adjacent to a chasm.

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Quickcast
upgrades.description: Casting underworld passage does not end your turn

name: Armageddon Blade
description: Grants target ally a melee version of Annihilate, gaining any bonuses you have to that spell.

upgrades.label: armor
upgrades.name: Armor of Armageddon
upgrades.description: Grants 25 resist to [fire:fire], [lightning:lightning], and [physical:physical] damage and provides thorns buff that deals 2 damage for each chaos type to enemies that attack buffed units.

upgrades.label: connected_group
upgrades.name: Mass Armaments
upgrades.description: Cast on a connected group.

upgrades.label: mega
upgrades.name: Mega Armageddon
upgrades.description: Provides unit with a melee version of Mega Annihilate instead of Annihilate.

name: Blizzard
description:
Create a blizzard with a [4_tile:radius] radius.
Each turn, units in the blizzard take [5_ice:ice] damage, and have a 50% chance to be [frozen].
[Frozen] units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking [fire] or [physical] damage.The blizzard lasts [5_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: freezing
upgrades.name: Flash Freeze
upgrades.description: Freeze all units in affected tiles for 2 turns.

upgrades.label: cast_icicle
upgrades.name: Hailstorm
upgrades.description: Each Blizzard has a 25% chance to cast your Icicle spell each turn.

name: Blood Golem
description:
Summon a Blood Golem.
The golem never takes damage, instead redistributing damage to its master and any [living] allies.
The Golem has a [25_physical:physical] damage melee attack, and thorns which deal 7 [physical] damage to units that attack the golem in melee.

upgrades.label: pain_aura
upgrades.name: Pain Aura
upgrades.description: The Blood Golem gains a [5_tile:radius] [poison] and [fire] damage aura.

upgrades.label: super_thorns
upgrades.name: Greater Thorns
upgrades.description: The Blood Golems thorns damage is increased by its minion damage stat.

upgrades.label: vampirism
upgrades.name: Vampire Golem
upgrades.description: Whenever the Blood Golem deals damage, half that much healing is distributed amongst its [living] allies.

name: Bone Barrage
description:
Your summoned allies in line of sight of the target take [physical] damage equal to half their health.
Each affected ally deals that much [physical] damage to the target.

upgrades.label: beam
upgrades.name: Bone Spears
upgrades.description: Bone Barrage damages all targets in a beam from the minion to the target

upgrades.label: dark
upgrades.name: Cursed Bones
upgrades.description: Bone Barrage also deals dark damage

name: Burning Idol
description:
Summons an Idol of Burning Sacrifice.
Each turn the idol consumes its lowest HP ally, dealing fire damage to enemies near the sacrificed unit.
The Idol and the wizard are both legal sacrifices.

upgrades.label: bone_explosion
upgrades.name: Bone Explosion
upgrades.description: Also deals [physical:physical] damage equal to half of the sacrificed unit's hp to all units within 4 tiles of the sacrificed unit.

upgrades.label: archon_beam
upgrades.name: Archon Beam
upgrades.description: Shoots lightning along the path to the sacrificed unit, damaging enemies and shielding allies

name: Call Seraph
description:
Summon a seraph.
Seraphim have [33_HP:minion_health], [3_SH:shields], and can fly.
Seraphim have a cleaving melee attack which deals [14_fire:fire] and [14_holy:holy] damage.
The seraph vanishes after [14_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: moonblade
upgrades.name: Moonblade
upgrades.description: The Seraph deals arcane damage in addition to fire and holy damage with its cleave attack.

upgrades.label: heal
upgrades.name: Heal Aura
upgrades.description: The Seraph heals all allies within 4 tiles for 4 HP each turn.

upgrades.label: holy_fire
upgrades.name: Holy Fire Aura
upgrades.description: The Seraph gains a damage aura, randomly dealing either [2_fire:fire] or [2_holy:holy] damage to enemies within 5 tiles each turn.

name: Carnival of Pain
description: Whenever an enemy takes [physical], [fire], or [lightning] damage, the [3:num_targets] nearest enemies take that much dark damage.

upgrades.label: lifesteal
upgrades.name: Lifesteal
upgrades.description: You heal for 50% of all damage dealt by this spell.

upgrades.label: death_power
upgrades.name: Death Power
upgrades.description: If the damage killed the enemy, the bolt coming out of that enemy deals 2x damage.

upgrades.label: summon_tormentor
upgrades.name: Torment
upgrades.description: Every 3 kills casts your Fiery Tormentor spell where the slain enemy was.

name: Combust Poison
description:
Consume all [poison] on enemy units.
Deal [fire] damage in an [2_tile:radius] burst around each affected enemy equal to [1x:damage] the amount of poison consumed.

upgrades.label: stun
upgrades.name: Paralyzing Combustion
upgrades.description: Stuns targets for 3 turns.

upgrades.label: healing
upgrades.name: Flame Rave
upgrades.description: Heal allies instead of hurt them.

upgrades.label: deal_poison
upgrades.name: Toxic Embers
upgrades.description: The explosion applies poison to damaged targets for one half of the [fire] damage taken.

name: Conductance
description:
Curse an enemy with the essence of conductivity.
That enemy loses [50_lightning:lightning] resist.
Whenever you cast a [lightning] spell targeting that enemy, copy that spell.
Lasts [10_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: copies
upgrades.name: Multicopy
upgrades.description: Make 1 extra copy of lightning spells cast on the target

name: Death Cleave
description:
Whenever a spell you cast kills its primary target, that spell is recast on a randomly selected nearby valid enemy target.
Lasts [2_turns:duration].

name: Dispersion Field
description:
Each turn, teleport [3_enemies:num_targets] in a [6_tile:radius] radius to random locations on the map.
Lasts [7_turns:duration].

name: Drain Pulse
description:
Deals [13:damage] [dark] and [poison] damage to units in a [8_tile:radius] burst.
You are healed for half the damage dealt.

upgrades.label: felomancy
upgrades.name: Felomancy
upgrades.description: Slain targets are raised as cursed cats.

upgrades.label: ursomancy
upgrades.name: Ursomancy
upgrades.description: Healing over the wizards max health is converted into blood bears.

name: Essence Flux
description:
Swap the polarity of the resistances of all other units in a [4_tile:radius] area.
[Fire] resistance is swapped with [ice].
[Lightning] resistance is swapped with [physical].
[Dark] resistance is swapped with [holy].
[Poison] resistance is swapped with [arcane].

name: Fiery Tormentor
description:
Summon a fiery tormentor.
The tormentor has [34_HP:minion_health].
The tormentor has a burst attack dealing [7_fire:fire] damage with a [4_tile:radius] radius.
The tormentor has a lifesteal attack dealing [2_dark:dark] damage with a [2_tile:minion_range] range.
The tormentor vanishes after [40_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: frostfire
upgrades.name: Frostfire Tormentor
upgrades.description: Summons a frostfire tormentor instead.

upgrades.label: metallic
upgrades.name: Metallic Tormentor
upgrades.description: Summons a metallic fiery tormentor instead.

upgrades.label: mass
upgrades.name: Tormenting Mass
upgrades.description: Summons a Fiery Tormenting Mass instead.

name: Fire Drake
description:
Summon a Fire Drake at target square.
Fire Drakes have [45_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_fire:fire] resist.
Fire Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [9_fire:fire] damage.
Fire Drakes have a melee attack which deals [8_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: broodlings
upgrades.name: Broodlings
upgrades.description: Summoned Fire Drakes can summon 2 Fire Lizards on a 9 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: metal
upgrades.name: Metal Dragon
upgrades.description: Summoned Fire Drakes are metallic

upgrades.label: dragon_mage
upgrades.name: Dragon Mage
upgrades.description: Summoned Fire Drakes can cast your Blazerip with a 4 turn cooldown.

name: Flame Burst
description: Deal [40_fire:fire] damage in a [8_tile:radius] burst around the caster.

upgrades.label: meltflame
upgrades.name: Melting Flame
upgrades.description: Melt walls adjacent to the blast

upgrades.label: dawnflame
upgrades.name: Bright Flame
upgrades.description: Flame Burst deals [holy] instead of [fire], and shields allied units instead of damaging them.

upgrades.label: spreadflame
upgrades.name: Spreading Flame
upgrades.description:
Each cast of flame burst consumes all remaining charges.
For each charge consumed, flame burst gets +1 radius and +1 damage.
Slain enemies create additional explosions with half radius and damage.

name: Ice Drake
description:
Summon an Ice Drake at target square.
Ice Drakes have [45_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_ice:ice] resist.
Ice Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [8_ice:ice] damage and [freezes] units.
Ice Drakes have a melee attack which deals [8_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: dracolich
upgrades.name: Dracolich
upgrades.description: Summoned Ice Drakes are Liches and can create a soul jars.

upgrades.label: broodlings
upgrades.name: Broodlings
upgrades.description: Summoned Ice Drakes can summon 2 Ice Lizards on a 9 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: dragon_mage
upgrades.name: Dragon Mage
upgrades.description:
Summoned Ice Drakes can cast Death Chill with an 8 turn cooldown.
This Death Chill gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Ice Orb
description:
Summon an ice orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb deals [6_ice:ice] damage to enemy units in a [4_tile:radius] radius.
[Frozen] units cannot act. Frozen units unfreeze upon taking [fire] or [physical] damage.The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by fire damage.

upgrades.label: freeze_damage
upgrades.name: Frostgleam
upgrades.description: Frozen enemies in radius additionally take [arcane:arcane] damage.

upgrades.label: summon_winter_faery
upgrades.name: Faebound Orb
upgrades.description: Summon a [winter_faery:ice] for each 75 damage dealt.

upgrades.label: cast_blizzard
upgrades.name: Blizzard Orb
upgrades.description: Ice Orb casts your Blizzard on an 8 turn cooldown.

name: Ice Vortex
description:
Must target a frozen unit.
All enemy units in a [5_tile:radius] radius are pulled towards that unit, [frozen] for [2_turns:duration], and dealt [11_arcane:arcane] and [11_ice:ice] damage.

name: Imp Swarm
description:
Each turn, summon [2_imps:num_summons] near the caster.
Imps have [5_HP:minion_health] and can fly.
Imps have a ranged attack dealing [3_damage:minion_damage] with a [3_tile:minion_range] range.
Each imp is either a [fire], [iron:physical], or [spark:lightning] imp.
The imps each last [11_turns:minion_duration], and this effect lasts [7_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: metalswarm
upgrades.name: Metal Swarm
upgrades.description: Imp swarm summons copper imps instead of spark imps, and furnace imps instead of fire imps.

upgrades.label: darkswarm
upgrades.name: Dark Swarm
upgrades.description: Imp swarm summons rot imps, void imps, and insanity imps instead of fire, spark, and iron imps.

name: Lightning Form
description:
Whenever you cast a [lightning] spell, teleport to that spell's target.
Gain [100_lightning:lightning] resistance.
Gain [100_physical:physical] resistance.
This effect ends the first turn that you fail to cast a [lightning] spell.

upgrades.label: lingering_form
upgrades.name: Lingering Form
upgrades.description: Lasts 3 turns after you cast a [lightning:lightning] spell instead of vanishing instantly.

upgrades.label: fire_form
upgrades.name: Fire Form
upgrades.description: Also works on [fire:fire] spells and gives [100_fire:fire] resist.

upgrades.label: crackling_aura
upgrades.name: Crackling Aura
upgrades.description: In lightning form, deal [5_lightning:lightning] damage to up to [4:num_targets] enemies in a 5 tile radius each turn.

name: Lightning Storm
description:
Create a thunderstorm with a [4_tile:radius] radius.
Each turn, each tile in the storm has a [50%_chance:strikechance] of taking [12_lightning:lightning] damage.
The storm lasts for [10_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Lightning Storm can be cast without line of sight

name: Mass Calcification
description:
All non undead allies are instantly killed and raised as bone shamblers.
Bone Shamblers have the same HP as the raised units, a quarter that much melee damage, and split into smaller shamblers on death.

upgrades.label: fae_bones
upgrades.name: Fae Bones
upgrades.description: Arcane Allies are raised as fae bone shamblers instead of normal ones.

upgrades.label: burning_bones
upgrades.name: Burning Bones
upgrades.description: Fire allies are raised as burning bone shamblers instead of normal ones.

upgrades.label: bone_shards
upgrades.name: Bone Shards
upgrades.description: Each slain ally deals [7_physical:physical] damage to up to [3:num_targets] enemies in line of sight.

name: Orb Control
description: Retarget all allied [orbs:orb] to target tile.

name: Pain Mirror
description:
Whenever you take damage, deal that much [dark] damage to all enemies in line of sight.
Lasts [14_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: flesh_harvest
upgrades.name: Flesh Harvest
upgrades.description: For every 100 damage taken during Pain Mirror, gain a charge of Summon Flesh Fiend.

upgrades.label: gain_resists
upgrades.name: Dulled Pain
upgrades.description: Gain 25% resist to [dark:dark], [arcane:arcane], [fire:fire], [lightning:lightning], and [physical:physical] damage during pain mirror.

upgrades.label: deal_fire
upgrades.name: Burning Pain
upgrades.description: Additionally deal [fire:fire] damage.

name: Permanence
description:
Your spells and temporary summons last an extra [5_turns:duration].
This effect lasts [20_turns:duration].

name: Petrification Aura
description:
Each turn, inflict [petrify] on up to [3:num_targets] unpetrified enemy units in a [7_tile:radius] radius each turn.
[Petrified] units cannot act.
[Petrified] units gain [100_ice:ice] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [100_lightning:lightning] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [75_physical:physical] resist.
[Petrified] units gain [75_fire:fire] resist.
Lasts [7_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: crumbling_aura
upgrades.name: Crumbling Aura
upgrades.description: Each turn, all petrified enemies within the aura with [16:damage] or less hp are instantly killed.

upgrades.label: wormification
upgrades.name: Wormification Aura
upgrades.description: Enemies slain while petrified within the range of the aura, the enemy is raised as a rock worm.

upgrades.label: glassify
upgrades.name: Glassify
upgrades.description: Turn enemies to glass instead of stone, makeing them take double physical damage instead of one quarter.

name: Purity
description:
Lose all debuffs.
You cannot gain new debuffs.
Lasts [6_turns:duration].

name: Pyrostatic Curse
description:
Curses targets in a [5_tile:radius] radius for [4_turns:duration].
Whenever a cursed target takes fire damage, [2:num_targets] random enemy units in line of sight of that unit are dealt that much [lightning] damage.

upgrades.label: remove_resistance
upgrades.name: Resistance Melting
upgrades.description: Removes 25 Fire resist from targets.

upgrades.label: beam
upgrades.name: Linear Conductance
upgrades.description: Redealt lightning damage is dealt along a beam instead of just to one target.

name: Searing Seal
description:
Gain Seal of Searing.
Whenever a unit takes [fire] damage, the seal gains that many charges.
When the seal expires, it deals [1_fire:fire] damage to all enemies in line of sight for every 5 charges it has.
The seal lasts [6_turns:duration].
Recasting the spell will expire the current seal and create a new one.

upgrades.label: slow_burn
upgrades.name: Slow Burn
upgrades.description: On expiring and dealing damage, gain a buff that redeals half the damage, then, finally, one that deals a third of it.

upgrades.label: chaos_seal
upgrades.name: Chaos Seal
upgrades.description: Gains charges separately from [fire:fire], [lightning:lightning], and [physical:physical] damage, and redeals each on expiration.

upgrades.label: fire_harvest
upgrades.name: Fire Harvest
upgrades.description: For every 100 damage dealt, summon a flame spirit.

name: Siege Golems
description:
Summons a crew of [3:num_summons] siege golems.
The siege golems will assemble an inferno cannon, or operate one if it is within [3_tiles:range].
The inferno cannon deals [30_fire:fire] damage to units in a [3_tile:radius] radius.
The cannon will explode when destroyed, dealing [30_fire:fire] damage equal to one quarter its maximum hp to units in a [3_tile:radius].

upgrades.label: assistant_cannoneers
upgrades.name: Assistant Cannoneers
upgrades.description: In addition to Siege Golems, summon 5 Goblin Assistants that can repair and operate inferno cannons.

upgrades.label: recycling
upgrades.name: Recycling
upgrades.description: Constructs and Metallic units killed by Inferno Cannons are summoned as Siege Golems.

upgrades.label: chaos_cannon
upgrades.name: Chaos Cannon
upgrades.description: Instead of summoning Siege Golems, summon Chaos Siege Golems. Chaos Siege Golems make a Chaos Cannon that shoots a Fire projectile, a Lightning projectile, and a Physical projectile with lowered radiuses.

name: Siphon Shields
description: Steal up to [1_SH:shields] from all enemy units in line of sight.

upgrades.label: shield_burn
upgrades.name: Shield Burn
upgrades.description: Deal 5 fire damage per shield stolen

name: Stampede Form
description:
Become an elephant and also summon [10:num_summons] elephants around you.
While in elephant form, you can walk over enemies, knocking them away and dealing [14_physical:physical] damage to them.
Gain 50 [physical] resist in elephant form.
When you cast a spell, elephant form ends and all the elephants are unsummoned.

upgrades.label: fae
upgrades.name: Fae Stampede
upgrades.description: Summon Faetouched elephants instead of normal ones.  Gain 50 arcane resist.  [Arcane] spells do not end elephant form.

upgrades.label: burning
upgrades.name: Burning Stampede
upgrades.description: Summon Burning elephants instead of normal ones.  Gain 50 fire resist.  [Fire] spells do not end elephant form.

upgrades.label: metallic
upgrades.name: Metal Stampede
upgrades.description: Summon Metallic elephants instead of normal ones.  Gain 25 fire and 50 lightning resist.  [Metallic] spells do not end elephant form.

name: Storm Burst
description:
Unleashes a [8_tile:radius] burst of storm energy.
Each tile in the burst takes either [20_ice:ice] damage or [20_lightning:lightning] damage.
Units dealt ice damage are [frozen] for [4_turns:duration].
Units dealt lightning damage are [stunned] for [4_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: grants_immunity
upgrades.name: Stormshield
upgrades.description: Allies in radius are not affected, and instead gain [ice:ice] and [lightning:lightning] immunity for [4_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: dual_burst
upgrades.name: Dual Nova
upgrades.description: Enemies take both lightning and ice damage instead of just one, and are both frozen and stunned.

upgrades.label: summon_threshold
upgrades.name: Spirit Nova
upgrades.description: Summons a Storm Spirit for every 40 damage dealt

name: Storm Drake
description:
Summon a storm drake at target square.
Storm drakes have [45_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_lightning:lightning] resist.
Storm drakes have a breath weapon which creates storm clouds that deal [10_lightning:lightning] damage.
Storm drakes have a melee attack which deals [8_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: storm_legion
upgrades.name: Storm Summoning
upgrades.description: Whenever you cast Storm Drake, up to [2:num_summons] lightning storms in line of sight of the target are converted into drakes

upgrades.label: ghost_drake
upgrades.name: Ghost Drake
upgrades.description: Summoned Storm Drakes are ghostly.

upgrades.label: drake_swap
upgrades.name: Drake Swap
upgrades.description: Whenever you target a summoned Storm Drake with a lightning spell, swap places with it.

upgrades.label: dragon_mage
upgrades.name: Dragon Mage
upgrades.description:
Summoned Storm Drakes can cast Chain Lightning with a 16 turn cooldown.
This Lightning Bolt gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: The Restless Dead
description:
Whenever a living enemy dies, raise it as a skeleton.
Raised skeletons have max HP equal to that of the slain unit, and deal [5_physical:physical] damage in melee.
Skeletons of flying units can fly.
This effect lasts [20_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: salvage
upgrades.name: Junk Golems
upgrades.description: Whenever an enemy constructs dies, raise it as a junk golem.

upgrades.label: spirit_catcher
upgrades.name: Elemental Spirits
upgrades.description: Whenever an enemy fire, ice or lightning unit dies, a random summoned ally gains 100 resistance to that element and a ranged attack of that type.  Each ally can gain only 1 such buff.

upgrades.label: friendly
upgrades.name: Restless Minions
upgrades.description: Allies can also be raised by Restless Dead

name: Vampiric Gaze
description: Each allied unit deals [6_dark:dark] damage to a random enemy in its line of sight.Each allied unit heals for all damage dealt.

upgrades.label: toxic_gaze
upgrades.name: Toxic Gaze
upgrades.description: Vampiric Gaze also deals poison damage

upgrades.label: vampire_tax
upgrades.name: Vampiric Tax
upgrades.description: You heal for 100% of the damage dealt

upgrades.label: refract
upgrades.name: Refracting Gaze
upgrades.description: Each bolt bounces once to a random enemy in line of sight of the original target

name: Void Beam
description: Deal [25_arcane:arcane] damage and destroy walls in a beam.

upgrades.label: voidbomber
upgrades.name: Void Binding
upgrades.description: Slain enemies are raised as void bombers

upgrades.label: starbeam
upgrades.name: Star Beam
upgrades.description: Void beam also deals [fire] damage

upgrades.label: voidcurse
upgrades.name: Voidcurse
upgrades.description: Enemies in the aoe lose 25 [arcane] resist

name: Void Drake
description:
Summon a Void Drake at target square.
Void Drakes have [45_HP:minion_health], fly, and have [100_arcane:arcane] resist.
Void Drakes have a breath weapon which deals [8_arcane:arcane] damage and melts walls.
Void Drakes have a melee attack which deals [8_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: dragon_mage
upgrades.name: Dragon Mage
upgrades.description:
Summoned Void Drakes can cast Magic Missile with a 3 turn cooldown.
This Magic Missile gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

upgrades.label: essence_drake
upgrades.name: Essence Drake
upgrades.description: Whenever a summoned Void Drake kills an enemy unit, a random temporary ally gains +5 turns to its duration.

name: Volcanic Eruption
description:
Create a [6_tile:radius] burst of lava in a chasm.
The burst flows up to [3_tiles:radius] out of the chasm.
The lava deals [52_fire:fire] damage

upgrades.label: requires_los
upgrades.name: Blindcasting
upgrades.description: Volcano can be cast without line of sight

upgrades.label: wall_cast
upgrades.name: Wallcano
upgrades.description: In addition to chasms, volcano may target walls.  Doing so turns the walls into chasms

name: Wall of Ice
description:
Summons a line of ice elementals with a length of [7_tiles:num_summons].
Ice elementals have [36_HP:minion_health], [50_physical:physical] resist, [100_ice:ice] resist, [-100_fire:fire] resist, and cannot move.
Ice elementals have a ranged attack which deals [5_ice:ice] damage at a range of up to [3_tiles:minion_range].
The elementals vanish after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: hungry_wall
upgrades.name: Hungry Wall
upgrades.description: +1 minion duration whenever an enemy dies of ice damage

upgrades.label: fae_wall
upgrades.name: Fae Wall
upgrades.description: Ice Walls gain fae modifier.

upgrades.label: endless_wall
upgrades.name: Endless Wall
upgrades.description: Infinite radius, make floors out of tiles in AoE.

name: Watcher Form
description:
Each turn, fire casts your Lightning Bolt at the farthest enemy in line of sight.
You cannot move or cast spells.
Gain 100 [physical] resist.
Gain 75 [fire] resist.
Gain 100 [lightning] resist.
Gain 100 [poison] resist.
Lasts [5_turns:duration]

upgrades.label: pyrostatic_watcher
upgrades.name: Pyrostatic Watcher Form
upgrades.description: Instead casts your Pyrostatic Pulse, gain [100_fire:fire] resist instead of 75.

upgrades.label: void_watcher
upgrades.name: Void Watcher Form
upgrades.description: Instead casts your Void Beam, gain [100_arcane:arcane] resist.

upgrades.label: chain_lightning_watcher
upgrades.name: Chain Watcher Form
upgrades.description: Instead casts your Chain Lightning.

name: Wheel of Death
description: Deal [200_dark:dark] damage to a random enemy unit.

upgrades.label: cheater
upgrades.name: Cheat Fate
upgrades.description: Death Roulette avoids shielded and dark immune enemies, and weights its target selection by current resistance adjusted hitpoints instead of uniformly.

name: Ball Lightning
description:
Summon a lighting orb next to the caster.
Each turn the orb fires [3_beams:num_targets] of electricity at random enemy units in line of sight. The beams deal [6_lightning:lightning] damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by lightning damage.

upgrades.label: final_burst
upgrades.name: Final Burst
upgrades.description: Casts your Arc Lightning when it dies.

upgrades.label: drakebirth
upgrades.name: Drakebirth
upgrades.description: Casts your Lightning Drake when it dies.

upgrades.label: pyrostatics
upgrades.name: Pyrostatics
upgrades.description: Instead of beams of lightning, fires your Pyrostatic Pulse.

name: Bloodflame
description:
All of your [Fire] spells can be cast instantly without ending your turn.
Whenever you cast a spell, take [6_fire:fire] damage.
Lose 50 [fire] resist.
Lasts 1 turn.

name: Blue Lion
description:
Summon a blue lion.
Blue lions have [28_HP:minion_health], fly, have [50_arcane:arcane] resist and [50_physical:physical] resist.
Blue lions have a spell that grants [1_SH:shield] to themselves and allies in their line of sight, up to a maximum of [2_SH:shield] with a cooldown of [3_turns:duration].
Blue lions also have a melee attack which deals [7_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: holy_bolt
upgrades.name: Holy Bolt
upgrades.description: The Blue Lion's melee attack is replaced by a range 6 holy bolt attack.

upgrades.label: healing_light_spell
upgrades.name: Shimmermane
upgrades.description: The Blue Lion gains your Healing Light spell on a 7 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: burning_lion
upgrades.name: Burning Lion
upgrades.description: Summon a Burning Lion instead of a Blue Lion.

name: Call Archon
description:
Summon an Archon.
Archons have [77_HP:minion_health], [3_SH:shields], and can fly.
Archons have beam attacks which deal [14_lightning:lightning] damage to enemies and shield allies.
The Archon vanishes after [17_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: healing
upgrades.name: Heal Beam
upgrades.description: Archon's attack heals allies it passes through.

upgrades.label: cascade
upgrades.name: Beam Arc
upgrades.description: Archon's attack arcs a maximum of one time to a nearby enemy.

upgrades.label: storm_archon
upgrades.name: Storm Archon
upgrades.description: Archon gains 50 Ice resist and its attack also deals Ice damage.

name: Cantrip Cascade
description: Cast each of your level 1 sorcery spells on each enemy in a cone.

upgrades.label: cantrip_burst
upgrades.name: Cantrip Burst
upgrades.description: Instead of a cone, Cantrip Cascade casts in a [5_tile:radius] burst.

upgrades.label: orb_cantrips
upgrades.name: Orb Cascade
upgrades.description: In addition to casting in a cone, all of your orbs cast a random known cantrip on the nearest foe in line of sight.

upgrades.label: cast_twos
upgrades.name: Evocation Amalgamation
upgrades.description: Additionally cast one random level 2 [sorcery] spell from your spellbook on all targets.

name: Chill Wind
description: Deals [21_ice:ice] damage and inflicts [6_turns:duration] of [frozen] on units in a [3_tile:radius] wide line perpendicular to the caster.

upgrades.label: refresh_conjuration
upgrades.name: Ice Guardians
upgrades.description: For each 100 damage dealt by a single cast, gain a charge of a random ice conjuration spell.

upgrades.label: mirror
upgrades.name: Dual Wind
upgrades.description: Chill Wind also casts behind the caster.

upgrades.label: cast_blazerip
upgrades.name: Arcane Storm
upgrades.description: On kill, Chill Wind casts your Blazerip spell.

name: Death Shock
description:
Deal [17_lightning:lightning] damage and [17_dark:dark] damage to the target.
If the target is slain, this effect bounces to a random enemy in line of sight up to [5_tiles:range] away.

upgrades.label: fire
upgrades.name: Fire Shock
upgrades.description: After dealing [dark] and [lightning] damage, deals [fire] damage as well

upgrades.label: shield_burn
upgrades.name: Shield Burn
upgrades.description: Before dealing damage, removes 3 SH

upgrades.label: corpse
upgrades.name: Corpse Construct
upgrades.description: If Death Shock kills one or more enemies, summon an electric zombie with hp equal to half the total hp of all slain enemies.

name: Fae Court
description:
Summons a group of [5:num_summons] faeries near the caster.
The faeries fly, and have [9_HP:minion_health], [1_SH:shields], [75_arcane:arcane] resistance, and a passive blink.
The faeries can heal allies for [5_HP:heal], with a range of [4_tiles:minion_range].
The faeries have a [4_arcane:arcane] damage attack, with a range of [4_tiles:minion_range].
The faeries vanish after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: winter_fae
upgrades.name: Winter Faery
upgrades.description: Summon winter faeries instead of normal ones. Winter faeries resist ice and can cast your Freeze spell on a 5 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: summon_queen
upgrades.name: Summon Queen
upgrades.description: A fae queen is summoned as well

upgrades.label: glass_fae
upgrades.name: Glass Faery
upgrades.description: Summon glass faeries instead of normal ones.

name: Flesh Fiend
description:
Summons a Fleshy Mass.
Fleshy Masses have [431_HP:minion_health] and regenerate 21 HP per turn.
Fleshy Masses have a melee attack which deals [19_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: belly_flop
upgrades.name: Belly Flop
upgrades.description: Gains a [25:damage] damage leap attack with a 7 turn cooldown.

upgrades.label: char_fiend
upgrades.name: Barbeque Fiends
upgrades.description: Summons burning flesh fiends instead of normal ones.

upgrades.label: worm_lord
upgrades.name: Worm Lord
upgrades.description: Flesh Fiends can cast your Lumbriogenesis spell on a 13 turn cooldown.

name: Floating Eye
description:
Summon a floating eye.
Floating eyes have [1_HP:minion_health], [4_SH:shields], fly, and passively blink.
Floating eyes have no attacks of their own, but will cast any other [eye] spells you know upon being summoned.
Floating eyes vanish after [16_turns:minion_duration].

name: Golden Skull
description:
Summons a golden skull.
Golden skulls are teleporting, floating, shielded stationary units.
Golden skulls have a [holy] beam attack and a single target healing spell.

upgrades.label: ghost_ball
upgrades.name: Ghost Caller
upgrades.description: The Golden Skull gains your Ghostball spell with a 6 turn cooldown

upgrades.label: wheel
upgrades.name: Bone Wheel
upgrades.description: The Golden Skull gains your Wheel of Death spell with a 12 turn cooldown

upgrades.label: bloodshift
upgrades.name: Blood Skull
upgrades.description: The Golden Skull gians your Bloodshift spell with a 3 turn cooldown

name: Heavenly Idol
description:
Summon an Idol of Beauty.
The idol has [35_HP:minion_health], [2_SH:shields], and is stationary.
The idol has a passive aura which affects all units in line of sight of the idol each turn.
Affected allies are healed for [1_HP:heal]. The Wizard cannot be healed in this way.
Affected enemies take [1_holy:holy] damage.
Affected [undead] and [demon] units take an additional [1_lightning:lightning] damage.
The idol vanishes after [15_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: fire_gaze
upgrades.name: Fire Gaze
upgrades.description: The Idol gains a fire beam attack

upgrades.label: shield_gaze
upgrades.name: Shield Gaze
upgrades.description: The Idol gains a single-target +4 SH ability, which sets the SH of a unit with less than 4 SH to 4 SH.

upgrades.label: immortality
upgrades.name: Bastion of Immortality
upgrades.description: Casts your Suspend Mortality on summoned ally units with a 5 turn cooldown

name: Ice Phoenix
description:
Summon an ice phoenix.
The phoenix has [74_HP:minion_health], flies, and reincarnates once upon death.
The phoenix has a ranged attack which deals [9_ice:ice] damage with a [4_tile:minion_range] range.
When the phoenix dies, it explodes in a [6_tile:radius] burst, freezing enemies for 4 turns and dealing them [25_ice:ice] damage, and granting [2_SH:shields] to allies.

upgrades.label: lives
upgrades.name: Reincarnations
upgrades.description: The phoenix will reincarnate 2 more times

upgrades.label: ice_aura
upgrades.name: Ice Aura
upgrades.description: The phoenix gains 2 damage ice aura with a 6 tile radius

upgrades.label: heal_aura
upgrades.name: Heal Aura
upgrades.description: The phoenix gains a 1 hp regen aura with a 6 tile radius

name: Mega Annihilate
description: Deals [99_fire:fire] damage, [99_lightning:lightning] damage, and [99_physical:physical] damage to the target.

upgrades.label: cascade_range
upgrades.name: Cascade
upgrades.description: Hits from Annihilate will jump to nearby targets if the main target is killed

upgrades.label: dark
upgrades.name: Dark Annihilation
upgrades.description: Annihilate deals an additional dark damage hit

upgrades.label: arcane
upgrades.name: Arcane Annihilation
upgrades.description: Annihilate deals an additional arcane damage hit

name: Night Hag
description:
Summon a Night Hag.
Night Hags can summon ghosts and drain HP from all living units in line of sight when they are wounded.
