upgrades.label: bone_spear
upgrades.name: Spear Hag
upgrades.description: The Night Hag gains your Bone Spear spell on a 4 turn cooldown

upgrades.label: nightmare
upgrades.name: Nightmare Hag
upgrades.description: The Night hag can cast your Nightmare spell

upgrades.label: bone_lady
upgrades.name: Bone Queen
upgrades.description: The Night Hag gains the ability to summon small bone shamblers

name: Pillar of Fire
description:
Deal [50_fire:fire] in a [1_tile:radius] burst.
Deal double damage to the center tile.

upgrades.label: channel
upgrades.name: Channeling
upgrades.description: Pillar of Flame becomes a channeled spell

upgrades.label: disruption
upgrades.name: Disrupting Flames
upgrades.description: Strips main target of shields and applies -50 Fire resist.

upgrades.label: cast_annihilate
upgrades.name: Pillar of Annihilation
upgrades.description: On kill, casts your Annihilate spell on up to 4 enemy units in line of sight of the target tile.

name: Ring of Spiders
description:
Summons a ring of giant spiders at the target, surrounded by a ring of webs.
Units blocking the spider ring are [poisoned] for [10_turns:duration], creatures blocking the web ring are [stunned] for [1_turn:duration].
Giant spiders have [14_HP:minion_health] and spin webs.
Giant spiders have a melee attack which deals [2_physical:physical] and inflicts [5_turns:duration] of [poison].
Webs [stun] non spider units which step on them for [1_turn:duration].
[Poisoned] units take 1 [poison] damage each turn and cannot heal.[Stunned] units cannot act.

upgrades.label: turbo_toxin
upgrades.name: Turbo Toxin
upgrades.description: Units blocking the spider ring instantly take 30 [poison_damage:poison].

upgrades.label: stun_duration
upgrades.name: Long Webs
upgrades.description: Units blocking the web ring are [stunned] for [5_turns:duration].

name: Slime Form
description:
Assume slime form for [8_turns:duration].
Gain [50_physical:physical] resist while in slime form.
Gain [100_poison:poison] resist while in slime form.
Summon a friendly slime each turn while in slime form.
Slimes have [10_HP:minion_health], have a 50% chance each turn to gain 1 max HP, and split into two slimes upon reaching twice their starting HP.
Slimes have a melee attack which deals [3_poison:poison] damage.

upgrades.label: fire_slimes
upgrades.name: Fire Slime
upgrades.description: Gain a chance to summon fire slime.

upgrades.label: ice_slimes
upgrades.name: Ice Slime
upgrades.description: Gain a chance to summon ice slime.

upgrades.label: void_slimes
upgrades.name: Void Slime
upgrades.description: Gain a chance to summon void slime.

name: Soul Tax
description:
Deal damage to target unit equal to one third of its health as [holy] damage, and then one third of its remaining health as [dark] damage.
Heal the caster for the total amount of damage dealt.

upgrades.label: arcane
upgrades.name: Arcane Taxation
upgrades.description: Soul tax deals an additional third of the target's remaining HP as arcane damage.

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Insta Tax
upgrades.description: Casting Soul Tax does not end your turn

upgrades.label: target_group
upgrades.name: Mass Taxation
upgrades.description: Targets a connected group of enemies.

name: Spider Queen
description:
Summon a spider queen.
The spider queen has [96_HP:minion_health].
The spider queen hatches [4:num_summons] baby spiders every [12_turns:duration].
Baby spiders have [3_HP:minion_health] and prefer to flee than attack, but they mature into giant spiders after [8_turns:duration] which have [14_HP:minion_health].
Giant spiders and the spider queen have melee attacks which deal [2_physical:physical] physical damage and inflicts 10 turns of [poison].

upgrades.label: aether
upgrades.name: Aether Queen
upgrades.description: Summon an aether spider queen instead.

upgrades.label: steel
upgrades.name: Steel Queen
upgrades.description: Summon a steel spider queen instead.

name: Teleport
description: Teleport to target tile

upgrades.label: quick_cast
upgrades.name: Quickcast
upgrades.description: Casting Teleport does not end your turn.

upgrades.label: group_teleport
upgrades.name: Group Teleport
upgrades.description: Teleport also teleports up to [10:num_targets] ally units with you.

upgrades.label: void_teleport
upgrades.name: Void Teleport
upgrades.description: Teleport deals arcane damage to all enemy units in line of sight of the targeted tile equal to its maximum number of charges.

name: Arc Lightning
description:
Lightning arcs to [4_enemies:num_targets] visible from the target tile.
Each arc deals [32_lightning:lightning] damage to units in a beam.

upgrades.label: arcane_arcs
upgrades.name: Proton Storm
upgrades.description: Arc Lightning deals [4_arcane:arcane] damage to all units in line of sight of each arc target

upgrades.label: enervation
upgrades.name: Enervation
upgrades.description: Arc Lightning heals allies instead of damaging them

name: Dragon Roar
description:
All allied dragons gain [25_max_HP:minion_health], [12:damage] attack damage, and [1_turn:duration] cooldown reduction.
Lasts [25_turns:duration].

name: Faehaunt Garden
description:
For [10:duration] turns, whenever you deal 50 or more [lightning] or [arcane] damage, summon a butterfly demon.
Butterfly demons fly and have [50_HP:minion_health] and [3_SH:shields].
Butterfly demons have [lightning] and [arcane] beam attacks which deal [7_lightning:lightning] and [9_arcane:damage], both with a range of [6_tiles:minion_range]. The arcane beam can melt through walls.
Butterfly demons are immune to [lightning], [arcane] and [dark] damage, but take 50% extra damage from [ice] and double damage from [holy].
Butterfly demons last [8_turns:minion_duration].

upgrades.label: gnomes
upgrades.name: Guardian Gnomes
upgrades.description: Summon 6 electric gnomes on casting faehaunt garden.

upgrades.label: flies
upgrades.name: Fae Flies
upgrades.description: Summon a Fae Fly Swarm every 15 damage.

upgrades.label: glass
upgrades.name: Glass Garden
upgrades.description: Summon Glass Butterflies instead of Butterfly Demons.

name: Flock of Eagles
description:
Summons [3_eagles:num_summons] near the caster.
Eagles have [18_HP:minion_health] and can fly.
Eagles have a melee attack which deals [6_physical:physical] damage.

upgrades.label: thunderbirds
upgrades.name: Thunder Claw
upgrades.description: Eagles gain your Thunder Strike spell on a 15 turn cool down.

upgrades.label: awe
upgrades.name: Untouchable Majesty
upgrades.description: Eagles deal 1 [holy] damage to anyone dealing them damage.

name: Furnace of Sorcery
description:
Summons a crucible of pain which summons furnace hounds whenever you deal 100 damage with [sorcery].
Furnace hounds have a [6_damage:damage] leap attack with a [4_tile:minion_range] range, a [1_fire:fire] damage aura with a [4_tile:radius] radius, and deal [4_fire:fire] damage to enemies that attack them in melee.
Furnace hounds are immune to [fire] and [lightning] damage, and take half damage from [physical] and [dark].
Furnace hounds take double damage from [holy] and 50% extra damage from [ice].

upgrades.label: flames
upgrades.name: Flames of Sorcery
upgrades.description: The furnace can cast your Flame Burst spell on a 5 turn coodlown.

upgrades.label: smithy
upgrades.name: Imp Smithy
upgrades.description: The furnace also produces an Copper Imp every 30 damage.

upgrades.label: lasers
upgrades.name: Arcane Eyebolts
upgrades.description: The hounds can cast your magic missile spell on a 4 turn cooldown.

name: Gold Drake
description:
Summon a Gold Drake.
Gold drakes have [45_HP:minion_health], [100_holy:holy] resist, and can fly.
Gold drakes have a breath weapon which deals [9_holy:holy] damage to enemies and heals allies for [9_HP:heal].
Gold drakes have a melee attack which deals [8_physical:physical] damage

upgrades.label: dragon_saint
upgrades.name: Dragon Saint
upgrades.description: Deals 14 [holy_damage:holy] to anything that deals damage to the Gold Drake.

upgrades.label: immortal_dragon
upgrades.name: Immortal Dragon
upgrades.description: Gold Drake gains the Immortal modifier.

upgrades.label: dragon_mage
upgrades.name: Dragon Mage
upgrades.description:
Summoned Gold Drakes can cast Healing Light with a 8 turn cooldown.
This Healing Light gains all of your upgrades and bonuses.

name: Heaven's Wrath
description:
Deal [22_lightning:lightning] damage and [22_holy:holy] damage to [3_units:num_targets] with the highest current HP.
Does not target friendly units or gates.

upgrades.label: culling
upgrades.name: Culling
upgrades.description: Heaven's Wrath also damages the units with the lowest current HP.

upgrades.label: stun_duration
upgrades.name: Halt Heretics
upgrades.description: Heaven's Wrath also applies Stun for [3_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: deal_fire
upgrades.name: Fiery Wrath
upgrades.description: Heaven's Wrath also deals fire damage.

name: Knightly Oath
description:
Summon a void knight, a chaos knight, and a storm knight.
Each knight has [90_HP:minion_health], various resistances, and an arsenal of unique magical abilities.
The caster takes [40_holy:holy] damage whenever a knight dies.

upgrades.label: void_court
upgrades.name: Void Court
upgrades.description: Summon only void knights.  Summon a void champion as well.

upgrades.label: storm_court
upgrades.name: Storm Court
upgrades.description: Summon only storm knights.  Summon a storm champion as well.

upgrades.label: chaos_court
upgrades.name: Chaos Court
upgrades.description: Summon only chaos knights.  Summon a chaos champion as well.

name: Mystic Memory
description: Regain all charges of a random other spell which currently has no remaining charges.

name: Searing Orb
description:
Summon a searing orb next to the caster.
The orb deals [3_fire:fire] damage each turn to all units in line of sight.
The caster is immune to this damage.
The orb has no will of its own, each turn it will float one tile towards the target.
The orb can be destroyed by ice damage.

upgrades.label: melt_walls
upgrades.name: Matter Melting
upgrades.description: Searing Orb can melt and be cast through walls

name: Twilight Gaze
description:
All enemies in line of sight lose [50_dark:dark] resist and [50_holy:holy] resist.
Lasts [10_turns:duration].

upgrades.label: arcane
upgrades.name: Arcane Gaze
upgrades.description: Twilight Gaze also reduces [arcane] resist.

name: Hatebolts
description:
Fires bolts at [4:num_targets] random enemies each turn, dealing [14_fire:fire] and [14_dark:dark] damage to all units on the path.
Can be channeld for up to 5 turns

upgrades.label: return
upgrades.name: Boomerang
upgrades.description: The bolts also return after they reach their target, damaging units in the middle a second time.

upgrades.label: toxic
upgrades.name: Toxic Hatred
upgrades.description: The bolts also deal [poison] damage

upgrades.label: harvest
upgrades.name: Torment Harvest
upgrades.description: If this spell kills an enemy, gain a charge of Summon Fiery Tormentor

name: Multicast
description:
Whenever you cast a [sorcery] spell, copy it.
Lasts [3_turns:duration]

name: Soul Wind
description:
Invokes a soul wind.  All units in the area take [37_dark:dark] damage.
All [undead], [dark], and [demon] units in the area take [37_holy:holy] damage instead.
[Living] units in the area have their souls ripped from their bodies and spawn spirits.
The spirits may have extra abilities and resistances based on the tags of the units they originated from.

upgrades.label: ensoulment
upgrades.name: Ensoulment
upgrades.description: Spawn ghosts from non [living] units as well

upgrades.label: arcane_wind
upgrades.name: Arcane Wind
upgrades.description: Also deals arcane damage to all units in the area of effect

upgrades.label: mirror
upgrades.name: Dual Wind
upgrades.description: Soul Wind also casts behind the caster.

name: Spikeball Factory
description: Surrounds the caster with spikeball gates, which will spawn spikeballs.

upgrades.label: manufactory
upgrades.name: Manufactory
upgrades.description: Surrounds the initially summoned gates with another layer of gates

upgrades.label: copper
upgrades.name: Copper Spikeballs
upgrades.description: Summons copper spikeballs instead of normal ones

name: Word of Beauty
description:
Heal yourself and all living units fully.
Deal [25_lightning:lightning] damage to [demon] and [undead] units.
[Stun] all [arcane] units for [7_turns:duration].

name: Word of Chaos
description:
[Stun] each enemy for [6_turns:duration] and teleport them to random tiles.
Deal [45_lightning:lightning] damage to all [fire] enemies.
Deal [45_fire:fire] damage to all [lightning] enemies.
Each enemy construct loses all [physical] resist and takes [45_physical:physical] damage.

name: Word of Ice
description:
All non [ice] immune enemies are [frozen] for [5_turns:duration].
Deals [50_ice:ice] damage to all fire units.

name: Word of Madness
description:
[Berserk] all units except the caster for [5_turns:duration].
Deal [dark] damage to all [construct] units equal to half their current HP.
Fully heal all [demon] units.

name: Word of Undeath
description:
All undead units have their current and maximum HP doubled.
All other units except the caster lose half their current and maximum HP.

name: Wyrm Eggs
description:
Summons [4:num_summons] Wyrm eggs near the caster.
Upon death, these eggs hatch into Wyrms.
Wyrms have [75_HP:minion_health], and regenerate 8 HP per turn.
Each wyrm is either a [fire] or an [ice] wyrm, being immune to its own element, but taking 50% extra damage from the other.
The wyrms have melee trample attacks dealing [14_physical:physical] damage and breath attacks that deal [7_damage:damage] of the appropriate type.
The ice wyrm breath weapon freeze units in the affected area for [2_turns:duration].

name: Gates of Helheim
description: Summons an Aelf spawner at a random location.

name: Horde of Halfmen
description: Summons [5:num_summons] Satyr and [5:num_summons] Minotaurs.

name: Rain of Fire
description:
Rains [9_meteors:num_targets] down on random tiles in a [7_tile:radius] radius each turn.
Each meteor mimics the effect of your Fireball spell.
Meteors destroy walls.
This spell can be channeled for up to [10_turns:duration].  The effect is repeated each turn the spell is channeled.

upgrades.label: chaos
upgrades.name: Chaos Storm
upgrades.description: Each meteor casts your Annihilate on [3:num_targets] enemy units within [4:radius] tiles

upgrades.label: dragons
upgrades.name: Rain of Dragons
upgrades.description: Each meteor has a 50% chance of casting your fire drake spell as well

upgrades.label: pyrostatic
upgrades.name: Pyrostatic Storm
upgrades.description: Each meteor casts your Lightning Bolt on up to [2:num_targets] enemies in line of sight

name: Ritual of Revelation
description:
Channel the Ritual of Revelation for [7_turns:duration].
Each turn while you channel the ritual, Holy Fire will be cast for free on [3:num_targets] enemy units in line of sight.
If not enough enemy units are in line of sight, allies will be targeted as well.
Units will never be targeted more than once.When the channel is complete, [7:num_summons] False Prophets will be summoned.

name: Summon Wizard
description: Summons a random wizard.

upgrades.label: clay_wizard
upgrades.name: Clay Wizard
upgrades.description: The summoned wizards are made of clay

upgrades.label: ghost_wizard
upgrades.name: Ghost Wizard
upgrades.description: The summoned wizards are ghostly

upgrades.label: wizard_army
upgrades.name: Wizard Gang
upgrades.description: Summon [3:num_summons] wizards
